actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Small Business.

official_title: To amend the Small Business Act to extend the redesignation period for certain Historically Underutilized Business Zones (HUBZones) in States with persistently high unemployment.

summary.text: Amends the Small Business Act to extend the redesignation period for certain Historically Underutilized Business Zones (HUBZones) in States with continued high unemployment relative to the year in which the HUBZone involved was created.

titles.title: To amend the Small Business Act to extend the redesignation period for certain Historically Underutilized Business Zones (HUBZones) in States with persistently high unemployment.
To amend the Small Business Act to extend the redesignation period for certain Historically Underutilized Business Zones (HUBZones) in States with persistently high unemployment.
